description:
The company that perfected the bug, has finally made pants. These lightweight pull-on pants protect you from midges, flies and mosquitoes, and they cut down the need to use insect repellents.

  • Polyester with UV protection
  • Loose fit for breathability
  • Long legs cover your ankles you crouch or kneel
  • Ankle stirrups further prevent exposed ankles
  • Elasticised waist with drawstring and cordlock
  • Side pockets protect your hands
name: Original Bug Shirt Company Original Bug Pants - Unisex
